comments:
JVEPROP01

To specify the bolditalic font style, the bold and italic styles are bitwise
ORed together (java.awt.Font.BOLD | java.awt.Font.ITALIC).  This is too
complicated for the init string parser.  This worked in 0.5.

The following exceptions show up in .log:

This will be fixed when we have property settings also use the new Parse tree
instead of init string parsing. Currently we don't do this, but it needs to be
done ASAP.
M1 released, move all resolved to Verified, as prelude to closing.
M1 released, move all resolved/verified to Closed.
